snippet: Federal authorities say the soldier, Craig B. Baxam, 24, flew to Kenya last month with the goal of joining the militant terrorist group Al Shabab in Somalia.
abstract: Federal authorities charge former soldier Craig B Baxam with trying to provide material support to a terrorist organization after he flew to Kenya in December 2011 with the goal of joining the militant group Al Shabab in Somalia.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities say the soldier, Craig B. Baxam, 24, flew to Kenya last month with the goal of joining the militant terrorist group Al Shabab in Somalia.

headline.main: Maryland: Former Soldier Charged With Trying to Aid Terrorism
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Ex-Soldier Suspected of Aiding Terrorists
